titleStmt.title: Carmina colloquia: or, A demonaicall and damnable dialogue, between the Devil & an independent. Written in the last year of our freedome: and first of our bondage, by the permission of God, and commission of the Devil. By Fardinando Fallall, at Edinburgh. And dedicated to all our friends about Whinfield-knot.
titleStmt.author: Fardinando Fallall.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
